title: BSC testnet cannot be synchronized normally
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
2.33.0-dev-b299133e
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Ubuntu 20.04.5 LTS (GNU/Linux 5.15.0-1026-aws aarch64)
Commit hash : 

#### Expected behaviour
 ./build/bin/erigon --datadir="/data/bsctestnet" --chain=chapel --port=30303 --http.port=8545 --authrpc.port=8551 --torrent.port=42069 --private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:9090 --http --ws --http.api=web3,net,eth,debug,trace,txpool --http.corsdomain=* --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.vhosts=* --torrent.download.rate=256mb

#### Actual behaviour

[2/16 Headers] No block headers to write in this log period block number=608380
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

I have synchronized several chains, all of which are normal, but there is a problem with the BSC test chain, and my deployment process is the same.

I repeated it several times, and this happens after a short period of time, and the synchronization is no longer continued, and it has been like this for a whole day.

How can I perform normal synchronization of BSC testnet?

#### Backtrace

